# not working
seas(x, x11 = "",
             xreg = cbind(genhol(cny, start = -7, end = -1, center = "calendar"), 
                          genhol(cny, start = 0, end = 7, center = "calendar")),
             regression.aictest = c("td", "user"), 
             regression.usertype = "holiday"
            )

# working
seas(x, x11 = "",
             xreg = cbind(genhol(cny, start = -7, end = -1, center = "calendar"), 
                          genhol(cny, start = 0, end = 7, center = "calendar")),
             regression.aictest = c("td", "user"), 
             regression.usertype = "holiday", estimate.maxiter = 3000
            )
